name: Zoner Callisto Metafile
summary: Learn about .ZMF files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Zoner Callisto is typically used by graphic designers, illustrators, and desktop publishing professionals in Central and Eastern Europe. Since Zoner software only supports the ZMF format, users typically export their designs to more universal formats, such as .JPEG or .PNG, to share with others.
NOTE: Zoner Software discontinued Callisto after releasing version 5 in 2012.

description: A ZMF file is a vector image created by Zoner Callisto, a Czech vector graphics editor. It contains image data in the proprietary Zoner Callisto Metafile (ZMF) format, which includes image layers, lines, shapes, colors, text, and other Callisto elements. Zoner Callisto users often save technical illustrations, business graphics, and other detailed artwork as ZMF files.

instructions: You can open ZMF files with Zoner Callisto in Windows. To open a ZMF file, select File â†’ Open (the interface is in Czech).
Zoner Callisto can convert ZMF files to other file types, including the following formats:
